story:
Once upon a time in a small Italian village nestled among the rolling hills and vineyards, there lived a little boy named Marco. Marco was a curious and adventurous boy who loved to explore the forests and fields surrounding his home.

One evening, as the sun began to set and the sky turned a deep shade of purple, Marco's mother called out to him from their cozy farmhouse. "It's time for bed, Marco!" she called. Marco hurried inside, washed up and put on his soft pajamas before climbing into his bed.

As Marco settled into bed, his mother sat beside him and began to tell him a magical story about a brave young knight who lived in a distant kingdom. This knight, named Lorenzo, was known far and wide for his kindness and courage.

Lorenzo had a special gift â€“ a golden amulet that glowed with a soft, warm light. This amulet was said to protect him from any danger and guide him on his quests. One day, a wicked sorcerer stole the amulet, plunging the kingdom into darkness and chaos.

Determined to save his kingdom, Lorenzo set out on a perilous journey to retrieve his amulet and restore peace. Along the way, he faced many challenges and encountered mystical creatures, but with his bravery and kind heart, he overcame every obstacle.

As the story unfolded, Marco's eyes grew heavy with sleep, but he listened intently to every word, captivated by the tale of courage and heroism. Finally, as his mother reached the happy ending of the story, Marco drifted off to sleep, his dreams filled with visions of noble knights and magical adventures.

And so, under the watchful gaze of the stars twinkling in the night sky, Marco slumbered soundly, his heart filled with dreams of bravery and hope.

The end. Goodnight, sweet Marco. May your dreams be as magical as the stories we share. Buonanotte, caro. Sleep tight.
